title: Apple AirPods On Sale for Amazon’s Big Spring Sale
description: Save big on both AirPods 4 and AirPods Pro (2nd Generation). Apple AirPods On Sale for Amazon’s Big Spring Sale Consequence Staff
author: Consequence Staff
excerpt: AirPods 4 and AirPods Pro (2nd Generation) are on sale for Amazon's Big Spring Sale. Save up to 32% off.

html:
Through March 31st, Amazon is hosting its Big Spring Sale, and Apple AirPods are among the big-ticket items up for grabs:

— AirPods 4 with Noise Cancellation are on sale for $148.99 ($17% off)

— AirPod 4 are on sale for $99.99 (22% off)

— AirPods Pro (2nd Generation) are on sale for $169.99 (32% off)

Apple AirPods offer a range of options to suit different audio needs, each providing pristine sound quality, seamless integration with Apple devices, and innovative features. The AirPods 4 deliver clear, high-quality sound with a comfortable fit, ideal for everyday listening. The AirPods 4 with Noise Cancellation take it a step further by featuring active noise cancellation to block out external sounds, providing a more immersive listening experience. Meanwhile, the AirPods Pro 2nd generation offer advanced noise cancellation, spatial audio for a surround-sound experience, and a customizable fit with multiple ear tips. All three models include Apple’s H1 chip for fast device pairing and enhanced battery life, with the AirPods Pro 2nd generation also offering improved sound performance with adaptive transparency and better in-ear stability.

As part of Amazon’s Big Spring Sale, a number of over-the-ear noise-cancelling headphones are also on sale. Additionally, is offering a “3 for the price of 2” sale on hundreds of vinyl and Blu-ray titles.

Plus, Amazon Music Unlimited is currently offering new subscribers three months free. Enjoy access to 100 million songs, podcasts, and audiobooks, ad-free and in high definition.
